RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.synopsis: Cazador greets Companion or Avatar Astarion in the ritual room, pleased Astarion has returned and he'll finally be able to complete the ritual. The other 6 vampire spawn are in their places for the ritual, ringing the room, held in spectral chains. Astarion starts nervous, but gets angrier as Cazador goads him until Astarion attacks. Cazador uses his magic to immobilise Astarion and then telekinetically flings him into his place (a spot directly behind Cazador) for the ritual, which then begins as the dialog ends and combat starts.
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.how_to_trigger: Ctrl+Shift+7 (Origin Debug Book)Astarion - Recruit - recruit him as Avatar or CompanionAstarion - Origin Moments - Act 3 Black Mass RitualApproach Cazador to start the dialog

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM.synopsis: AOM/OOM dialog with the prisoners in Cazador's Palace. Astarion meets Sebastian - a young man he seduced and brought to Cazador - for the first time in 170 years. Astarion was sure Sebastian was dead, but Cazador secretly turned him into a vampire spawn. If you aggrevate Sebastian, he'll be so full of hate and pain that he'll curse you.
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: For AOMOrigin Debug Book (Ctrl+Shift+7)Astarion - Recruit - As AvatarAstarion - Act 3 Origin Moments - CellsFor COMOrigin Debug Book (Ctrl+Shift+7)Astarion - Recruit - As Companionselect your starting characteroe debugbookDowngrade to companionAstarion - Act 3 Origin Moments - Cells

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: Origin Debug Book (Ctrl + Shift + 7)Astarion - Recruit as Companion or AvatarAstarion - Origin Moments - KennelMove in the direction the characters are facing

Astarion was sure Sebastian was dead, but Cazador secretly turned him into a vampire spawn. If you aggrevate Sebastian, he'll be so full of hate and pain that he'll curse you.
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM.how_to_trigger: Origin Debug Book (Ctrl+Shift+7)Astarion - Recruit - As CompanionAstarion - Act 3 Origin Moments - Cells

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.synopsis: Astarion addresses a defeated Cazador after their fight. He pulls his former master from the coffin where he's recovering and has to decide what to do with him - kill him or carve the scars on Astarion's back into Cazador's and then use him as a sacrifice in the ritual.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.how_to_trigger: Ctrl+Shift+7 (Origin Debug Book)Astarion - Recruit - recruit him as Avatar or CompanionAstarion - Origin Moments - Act 3 Black Mass RitualApproach Cazador, skip the dialog till a fight starts.Reduce Cazador to zero hitpoints

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Who stands before us? Is this truly our prodigal son?

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Do not slouch before me, boy! Have you no respect for yourself?
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion straightens up as Cazador snaps at himNodeContext: Snapping

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Look at you, crawling back after abandoning your family. You should be begging our forgiveness.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Forgiveness? You've never forgiven anything.
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: NodeContext: Tense, through gritted teeth.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Every mistake, every slip was punished!

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: I strove for perfection in all things - even those as imperfect as you.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: A pity you amounted to so little, despite my efforts.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: No! No, fuck you and fuck everything you've ever done to me.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Oh thankless child. Did I not bless you with our immortal gift? Did I not make you what you are?

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: You son of a bitch!
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: CinematicNodeContext: About to leap at Cazador

CinematicNodeContext: Astarion leaps towards Cazador, ready to kill. Cazador doesn't move or flinch, he simple slams the butt of his staff on the floor and Astarion freezes, hands inches from Cazador's face.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: You truly forgot my power. You truly thought our bond as creator and creation was all that stopped you from killing me.
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: NodeContext: Disappointed - almost sad - at how stupid Astarion's been

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: You are weak, my child. You are a small, pathetic little boy who never amounted to anything.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Urgh... argh...
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: NodeContext: Astarion's body is locked in place. He tries to resist, but can only grunt in pain

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: But today, you will finally do something worthwhile. You will burn, and I will ascend.
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: CinematicNodeContext: Leaning in to whisper in Astarion's earNodeContext: Leans in to whisper in Astarion's ear

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: True

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cazador points his staff at Astarion to yeet him into place for the ritual, but nothing happens. Cazador looks confused.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Even now you resist? Very well, but you will not stop my ascent. Ecce dominus!
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: NodeContext: Latin: [Eck-ay dom-in-oose]

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: False

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a twist of his staff, Cazador hurls Astarion through the air, locking him in his spot for the ritual.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Who stands before us? Is this truly our prodigal son?
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion starts to hunch - like an angry, cornered dog

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Do not slouch before me, boy! Have you no respect for yourself?
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion straightens up as Cazador snaps at himNodeContext: Snapping

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Look at you, crawling back after abandoning your family. You should be begging our forgiveness.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Keep back. Do not intervene.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Forgiveness? You've never forgiven anything.
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: NodeContext: Tense, through gritted teeth.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Every mistake, every slip was punished!

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: I strove for perfection in all things - even those as imperfect as you.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: A pity you amounted to so little, despite my efforts.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: No! No, fuck you and fuck everything you've ever done to me.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: We're here for justice. You're going to pay.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: I will not speak to cattle! This is between me and the boy.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: We're here to stop the ritual.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: The cattle low about things of which they know nothing.
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: NodeContext: Amused

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: This ritual is centuries in the making. Nothing shall stop it now.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: That's what you think, you son of a bitch!
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: CinematicNodeContext: About to leap at Cazador

CinematicNodeContext: Astarion leaps towards Cazador, ready to kill. Cazador doesn't move or flinch, he simple slams the butt of his staff on the floor and Astarion freezes, hands inches from Cazador's face.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: You truly forgot my power. You truly thought our bond as creator and creation was all that stopped you from killing me.
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: NodeContext: Disappointed - almost sad - at how stupid Astarion's been

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: You are weak, my child. You are a small, pathetic little boy who never amounted to anything.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Urgh... argh...
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: NodeContext: Astarion's body is locked in place. He tries to resist, but can only grunt in pain

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: But today, you will finally do something worthwhile. You will burn, and I will ascend.
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: CinematicNodeContext: Leaning in to whisper in Astarion's earNodeContext: Leans in to whisper in Astarion's ear
CinematicNodeContext: With a twist of his staff, Cazador hurls Astarion through the air, locking him in his spot for the ritual.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: No! Stop him! And get me out of this!
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: CinematicNodeContext: Struggling against spectral chainsNodeContext: Desperate

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Witness the birth of the Vampire Ascendant! Ecce dominus!
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: NodeContext: Latin: [Eck-ay dom-in-oose]

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: What are you doing with those people?

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: You came here wholly ignorant? With no concept of what you were about to witness?

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: This is the Rite of Profane Ascension - attempted only once in legend.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Seven thousand souls, each bearing the scar of the one who brought them to me, stand ready to be sacrificed.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: In their blood I shall be reborn, free to walk in the sun's rays. Free from sanguinary hunger. And free to crush any who stand against me with merciless power.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Blessed are you to be the first I shall consume when I become the Vampire Ascendant.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Careful, Astarion. Don't lose your head.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Do the cattle not know you, boy? Have they not seen your fits of temper?

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: You son of a bitch!
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: CinematicNodeContext: About to leap at Cazador

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Say nothing.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: They told me you had changed. I dared not believe it.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: I suspected you would return to me changed. Never did I imagine you would be so wretched.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Oh thankless child. Did I not bless you with our immortal gift? Did I not make you what you are?

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: We know all about the ritual. We're here to stop you.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: He doesn't owe you anything.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Have you fallen so far that this speaks for you?
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: InternalNodeContext: 'This' referring to the playerNodeContext: Incredulous, esp. on 'this'

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: I don't need anyone to speak for me.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: No, you always had a gift for words.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: I fondly remember your empty boasting, your tired jokes, your endless prattle...

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: No! Shut up!

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Astarion was afraid of you? You're pathetic.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: What in the Hells is going on here?

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Can it be? Is this our prodigal son standing before us?

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: And this is how you present yourself to me? Some ragged traveller? Have you fallen so low without me?

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: And after you abandoned us. You should be begging forgiveness, child.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: I don't owe you a damn thing.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: You owe me everything, you fetid little rat.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: I gave you this immortal gift. I made you part of our great purpose. Part of something grander than you could ever be alone.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: I'm here to stop you and this cursed ritual.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Such ingratitude from one who owes me so much.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: What is this? Why are the others in chains?

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: You came here wholly ignorant? With no concept of what you were about to witness?

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: This is the Rite of Profane Ascension - attempted only once in legend.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: In their blood I shall be reborn, free to walk in the sun's rays. Free from sanguinary hunger. And free to crush any who stand against me with merciless power.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: I shaped you into what you are. Without me you are less than nothing.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: I've soared without you. I've walked in the sunlight.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: A sweet irony that your destruction will grant me the same freedom.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: I've been free of your rules. I've tasted the blood of thinking creatures.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Look at how proud you are, you disobedient pup. But you forget yourself.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Even if you can resist my words, you are still mine, boy.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Now, it is time for you to join the others and complete our destiny.
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures around, where we can see Cazador's other vampire servants trapped in spectral chains. (They're in a circle around the edges of the room)

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: No. I'm not some goat to sacrifice in your ritual.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Do not flatter yourself, child. You are barely even a sacrifice - more a means to an end.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: What is this? What are you doing to them?

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Each of you children brought me a thousand souls. Now they stand marked with your scars, ready to be sacrificed.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: You were a means to an end. And the end is nigh.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: It's time for you to die.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Nay, child, I shall be reborn. I shall emerge more powerful than any of our kind has ever been!

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: And you will serve your purpose. You were never more than a means to an end.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: And the end is nigh.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cazador raises his staff and slams the butt of it against the floor.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: *You can feel tendrils of magic snaking through your veins, locking you in place.*
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion's body jolts and shudders. He spasms, head tilted back, and is locked in place.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: All those souls you brought me, all linked through those lines I carved on your back. All linked through your blood.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Resist his blood magic. Without allies, it's all over if he takes control of you.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Force your body to resist - don't let him control you.
True

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: *Your body locks, but it moves no further. You can feel Cazador trying to control you, but you fight the magic to a standstill.*

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Even now you resist? Very well, but you will not stop my ascent. Ecce dominus!
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: NodeContext: Latin: [Eck-ay dom-in-oose]

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: False

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: *You try to resist, but there's nothing you can do. Your body is riddled with the magic - you are his to control.*

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: *The scars on your back flare to life, as if you can feel the knife in your flesh all over again.*
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a twist of his staff, Cazador hurls Astarion through the air, locking him in his spot for the ritual.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Now we will begin. Now you will witness the birth of the Vampire Ascendant.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Ecce dominus!
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: NodeContext: Latin: [Eck-ay dom-in-oose]

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Give in, let him control you.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: *You relax into the magic's embrace, giving yourself up to its control.*

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: And if I do join them?

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Two centuries in my service and you still think you have a choice in the matter? Stupid, stupid boy.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: You can't kill all these people. I won't let you.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Did you grow a conscience, pup? It doesn't suit you.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: You could have found some nice, deep hole to cower in, but no. You marched straight back here.
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: NodeContext: almost disgust on the first line

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: I'm an angel of vengeance. That's what you made me.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Why do you insist on such grand notions, so far removed from reality?

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: We're finishing this ritual. But I'm taking the power, not you.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Ha! Have you lost all leave of your senses?
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: NodeContext: disbelieving

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Soon you'll be begging for your life.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: You dare speak thusly to me?

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: I am here to take my rightful place. I'm going to ascend.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: I always knew you to be a fool, but I never thought you delusional.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: The Rite of Profane Ascension is not some playbook to be picked up and read from. You cannot simply drop one role and assume another.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Read the rites and you will be destroyed. I would almost like you to try, just to watch you burn.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: Thankfully, your life is not yours to squander. You belong to me, boy. And you will fulfil your purpose.

RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.text: You returned! And true to your word, our prodigal son stands before us.
RitualRoom_PreCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_COM.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion starts to hunch - like an angry, cornered dog

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_38.speaker: Narrator
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_38.text: *Approaching the cells, you're met by hollow faces and eyes reluctant to meet your gaze. There's an almost physical stink of decay and neglect.*

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_100.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_100.context: CinematicNodeContext: Prisoner at the back of the cell, in the shadows

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_91.speaker: Narrator
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_91.text: *The last time you heard this voice, it was singing drunkenly, whispering sweetly, then sighing with pleasure.*

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_60.speaker: Narrator
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_60.text: *One of your conquests, claimed for Cazador. He should have been consumed long ago.*

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_84.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_84.text: It's your fault. You stole my life - stole my death.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_46.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_46.text: You smiled and joked and got me drunk.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_19.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_19.text: You called me so many sweet things. My name sounded like a lyric on your tongue.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_87.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_87.text: I want to hear you say it again. Say my name.
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_87.context: CinematicNodeContext: vampire spawn steps from the shadows at the rear of the cell into the light - he's emaciated, filthy, and dressed in rags that were once finery

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_77.speaker: Narrator
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_77.text: *He looks at you expectantly, his hollow eyes boring into yours.*

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_73.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_73.text: You still make it sound so beautiful.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_21.text: You were my first. And my last.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_36.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_36.text: The scar on your face - it must bind you to Cazador's Black Mass. I need to kill him.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_47.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_47.text: I'm here to stop the Black Mass - to kill Cazador.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_53.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_53.text: You should be dead. Why didn't Cazador feed on you?

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_10.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_10.text: He made me a spawn. Left me here to rot.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_69.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_69.text: But I can't rot - I can't die.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_61.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_61.text: You brought me to this hell. Abandoned me.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_17.text: One hundred and seventy years. You were one of my first too.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_97.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_97.text: My family - my friends - they're gone...
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_97.context: NodeContext: cracked voice, his mind is slipping

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_41.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_41.text: You took them from me. You took everything from me!

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_110.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_110.text: I can fix this. When I kill Cazador, you'll be free.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_1.text: Kill that monster? You can't. It's impossible.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_113.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_113.text: His staff controls everything... If you can get it, maybe you can free us...

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_42.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_42.text: His staff controls everything... If you can get it, maybe you can free us...

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_2.text: Tell me where he is, and I swear I'll end him.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_99.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_99.text: When he's dead, you'll be mine to command.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_76.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_76.context: CinematicNodeContext: Prisoner launches himself forward, smashing against the bars, reaching for Astarion, who steps back just in time. NodeContext: Shout of rage

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_20.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_20.text: You did this to me! You did this to us all! You cursed us to this hell.
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sebastian pointing at the player (Astarion) through the bars

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_71.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_71.text: I damn you, Astarion! I damn you to the same misery you brought on us!
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_71.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sebastian pointing at the player (Astarion) through the barsNodeContext: Mix of rage and sobbing tears - Sebastian is broken

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_29.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Broken, cryingNodeContext: sobbing tears - Sebastian is broken

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_55.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_55.text: Free? I'll never be free! I'll never be whole!

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_59.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_59.text: I truly wanted you - Cazador forced me to harm you. I'll kill him.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_105.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_105.text: Well, at least you only had the best.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_44.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_44.text: There were so many of you - I can't remember them all.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_108.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_108.text: You don't - you don't even remember...

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_25.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_25.text: He called me darling, desire, delicious... but nothing sounded so sweet as the way he said Sebastian.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_39.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_39.text: What are you doing? Stop - get out of my head!

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_32.speaker: Narrator
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_32.text: *You remember the taste of his lips, the heat of his body...*

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_51.speaker: Narrator
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_51.text: *Among the scars on his face is one you recognise - it's identical to one of the runes carved into your back.*

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_15.text: That scar on your face - it must bind you to Cazador's Black Mass.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_111.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_111.text: No more games. Say my name!

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_98.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_98.text: That scar on your face - what does it mean?

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_57.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_57.text: You're mistaken. I have no idea who you are.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_23.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_23.text: You whispered my name, over and over. It sounded like a lyric on your tongue.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_104.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_104.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion walks toward the cells, looking at the prisoners through the barsNodeContext: Rhetorical question - not necessarily expecting an answer.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_89.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_89.text: I... I recognise that voice. You were in the Blushing Mermaid.
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_89.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion steps closer to the cell

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_85.speaker: Narrator
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_85.text: *Among the scars on his face is one is recognisable - identical to one of the runes carved into Astarion's back.*

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_83.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_83.text: That scar - Cazador did that to you? He bound you to the Black Mass?

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_33.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_33.text: That scar - Cazador did that to you? What does it mean?

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_5.text: I can put this right, I swear. I'm here to stop the Black Mass - to kill Cazador.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_65.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_65.text: Tell me where he is, and I swear I'll end him.

Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_82.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_82.text: I can put this right, I swear. I can kill Cazador and free us all.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_2.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_2.text: So so, you've come home, little one. And come to visit Godey in your old kennel.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_52.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_52.text: It's taking everything I have not to grind your rotten carcass to dust.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_25.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_25.text: Don't be mad at Godey, child. I only did my job. Only kept you in line.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_4.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_4.text: You tortured us. For days at a time.
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_4.context: NodeContext: Growly or through gritted teeth

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_17.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_17.text: Oh yes, and you sang so sweetly for me. None of the others screamed like you did.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_32.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_32.text: But you're home now, and you brought me a treat, eh? A new friend for Godey?

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_11.speaker: Player
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_11.text: Cazador hired me to capture Astarion. I'm here to deliver.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_50.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_50.text: But you're too late to see the master. The doors are sealed, he will not be disturbed.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_16.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_16.text: Doors can be unsealed. Just give us the key and we'll show ourselves in.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_6.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_6.text: Godey will not open them for anyone, much less for you.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_12.speaker: Player
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_12.text: Your master needs Astarion for the ritual. He'll be furious if you stop us joining him.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_7.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_7.text: Godey was wondering about that... Godey knows the master was searching for Astarion. He must have forgotten Astarion was lost.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_53.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_53.text: Take it and trouble Godey no more. Let the master know I found Astarion.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_21.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_21.text: Now go to him. Help him achieve his destiny.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_37.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_37.text: Here, here it - no... where is it?

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_29.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_29.text: No no, master will be furious if it is lost. Godey must find it.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_28.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_28.text: The master will not be disobeyed! You will not open that door.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_47.speaker: Player
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_47.text: Cazador gave me orders too - Astarion needs to be returned no matter what.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_13.speaker: Player
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_13.text: How about I start breaking bones and keep going until I find that key?

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_1.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_1.text: Wait! Godey has the key. Godey can give it to you.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_0.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_0.text: Oh no. No no no, Godey is not worried by your threats. Godey has seen so much worse than you.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_23.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_23.text: Things have changed, Godey. We might surprise you.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_20.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_20.text: I doubt it, little one. Come, let's hear you scream one last time.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_5.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_5.text: Oh yes, fight Godey. Spill your blood on his kennel's floor.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_10.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_10.text: Doors can be unsealed. Do you have the key?

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_26.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_26.text: Perhaps. But the master ordered the doors closed until he was finished.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_39.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_39.text: Lies, lies, lies! And lies must be punished.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_44.speaker: Player
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_44.text: Lay a hand on me and lose it, bones.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_24.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_24.text: Not very nice. Not very friendly.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_14.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_14.text: Why are you here, then, little one? If not to see Godey.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_40.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_40.text: We're here to see the master, but the ballroom door's locked. Give us the key.
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_40.context: NodeContext: reluctantly calling Cazador 'the master' to try and trick Godey into giving you the key

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_42.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_42.text: Hah! No no, it is too late. The doors are sealed on master's orders.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_27.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_27.text: Isn't it obvious? I'm going to kill Cazador.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_8.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_8.text: How dare you! As if you could lay a finger on the master, you ungrateful little brat!

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_49.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_49.text: Godey will not let you get away with blasphemy. Godey will see you punished!

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_30.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_30.text: I know you're there, Godey. Stop skulking and show yourself.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_48.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_COM_48.text: You always were sharp, little one. Sharp enough to cut yourself.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_24.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_24.text: So so, you've come home, little one. And come to visit Godey in your old kennel.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_55.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_55.text: It's taking everything I have not to grind your rotten carcass to dust.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_21.text: Don't be mad at Godey, child. I only did my job. Only kept you in line.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_4.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_4.text: You tortured us. For days at a time.
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_4.context: NodeContext: Growly or through gritted teeth

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_8.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_8.text: Oh yes, and you sang so sweetly for me. None of the others screamed like you did.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_59.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_59.text: But if you're not here to see Godey, why are you here, little one?

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_42.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_42.text: We're here to see the master, but the ballroom door's locked. Give us the key.
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_42.context: NodeContext: reluctantly calling Cazador 'the master' to try and trick Godey into giving you the key

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_17.text: Hah! No no, it is too late. The doors are sealed on master's orders.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_45.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_45.text: Godey will not open them for anyone, much less for you.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_52.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_52.text: I was hoping you'd say that. Taking it from the ruins of your corpse will be more satisfying anyway.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_53.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_53.text: You can try, little one, but you will fail.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_26.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_26.text: Now, let's hear that scream of yours one last time.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_3.text: Isn't it obvious? I'm going to kill Cazador.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_46.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_46.text: How dare you! As if you could lay a finger on the master, you ungrateful little brat!

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_30.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_30.text: Godey will not let you get away with blasphemy. Godey will see you punished!

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_57.speaker: Narrator
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_57.text: *The familiar stink of the cell fills your nostrils and memories flood back. You remember spending days, tendays, locked down here in 'the Kennel', suffering endless tortures.*

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_44.speaker: Narrator
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_44.text: *This playground belonged to Godey - a skeleton sadistic enough that Cazador left him in charge of 'discipling' you and the other vampire spawn.*

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_65.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_65.text: Remembering the good times, little one?

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_67.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_67.text: Remembering how you'd sing for Godey? Oh, but I have missed your screams.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_73.speaker: Narrator
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_73.text: *The very same skeleton you catch trying to sneak up on you now.*

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_6.text: You always were sharp, little one. Sharp enough to cut yourself.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_56.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_56.text: What are you doing here? Did you miss me as I've missed you?

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_51.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_51.text: I've come home to rejoin the family.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_33.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_33.text: But you're too late, the master entered the ballroom and had me seal the doors behind him. They will not to be opened until his business is done.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_66.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_66.text: He needs me to complete the ritual. He'll be furious if you stop me from joining him.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_68.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_68.text: Perhaps. You did come home... Yes, you can be trusted. It is a family key, after all.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_43.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_43.text: Family or not, the master will be obeyed! You will not open that door.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_72.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_72.text: But master called me home! I have to get to him!

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_9.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_9.text: After all these years, you still think you can lie to me? Shame on you.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_31.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_31.text: It seems I need to put you in your place one last time. Then you're the master's.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_47.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_47.text: The ballroom door's locked and I need the key.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_40.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_40.text: The doors are locked for a reason - master ordered it so. Master ordered they not be opened, so locked they shall remain.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_14.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_14.text: I'm looking for Cazador. Where is he?

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_29.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_29.text: You're too late, the master entered the ballroom and ordered the doors be sealed behind him. They are not to be opened until his business is done.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_5.text: Godey will not disobey the master, much less for someone like you.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_1.text: He needs me to complete the ritual. He'll be furious if you stop me from joining him.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_32.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_32.text: Godey was wondering about that... Godey knows the master was searching for Astarion. He must have forgotten Astarion was lost.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_12.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_12.text: Take it and go. Impudent little brat.
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_12.context: NodeContext: Last line under his breath

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_37.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_37.text: Now go to him. Help him achieve his destiny.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_70.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_70.text: Here, here it - no... where is it?

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_69.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_69.text: No no, master will be furious if it is lost. Godey must find it.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_49.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_49.text: The master will not be disobeyed! You will not open that door.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_11.text: But master called me home! I have to get to him!

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_25.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_25.text: How about I start breaking bones and keep going until I find that key?

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_60.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_60.text: Wait! Godey has the key. Godey can give it to you.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_13.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_13.text: Oh no. No no no, Godey is not worried by your threats. Godey knows just how to break you.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_35.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_35.text: Come little one, let's hear that scream of yours one more time.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_76.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_76.text: Oh yes, fight Godey. Spill your blood on his kennel's floor.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_54.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_54.text: I do want to hurt you, if that's what you mean.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_34.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_34.text: Hah! You think you can hurt Godey? Oh no, you have been away for too long.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_27.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_27.text: Isn't it obvious? I'm here to kill Cazador.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_38.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_38.text: How dare you! As if you could lay a finger on the master, you ungrateful little brat!

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_41.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_41.text: Godey will not let you get away with blasphemy. Godey will see you punished!

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_64.speaker: Astarion
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_64.text: I know you're there, Godey. Stop skulking and show yourself.

Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_50.speaker: Godey
Kennel_OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_50.text: You always were sharp, little one. Sharp enough to cut yourself.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_54.speaker: Narrator
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_54.text: *Approaching the cells, you're met by hollow-eyed faces. There's an almost physical stink of decay and neglect.*
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_54.context: CinematicNodeContext: shot of the prisoners in the cells

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_74.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_74.text: Oh they're disgusting. Cazador never fed on wretches like this.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_13.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_13.text: How did they get here? What is Cazador doing with them? I should have guessed there was more to it than Raphael would ever have told.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_92.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_92.text: How did they get here? What is Cazador doing with them? My brethren spoke nothing of this...

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_39.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_39.text: They could be sacrifices for the Black Mass, but where did he get them all?

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_0.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_0.text: But who knows? Maybe the old man's tastes've changed since I left.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_38.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Prisoner at the back of the cell, in the shadows

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_89.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion frowns and approaches the cell to get a better look at the prisoner who spoke in the previous node. The prisoner steps out of the shadow - he's emaciated, filthy, and dressed in rags that were once finery

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_106.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_106.text: You're the one from the tavern. You smiled and joked and got me drunk.
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_106.context: NodeContext: sad but not too emotional - this character is traumatised - addressing Astarion from inside a cell (Astarion is standing outside the cell looking in)

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_82.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_82.context: NodeContext: looking at a victim of his he thought was long dead

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_93.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_93.text: You called me so many sweet things. My name sounded like a lyric on your tongue.
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_93.context: NodeContext: sad but not too emotional - this character is traumatised - addressing Astarion from inside a cell (Astarion is standing outside the cell looking in)

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_19.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_19.context: NodeContext: says his name in shock, quietly

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_66.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_66.text: You were handsome. Shy. You'd never been kissed.
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_66.context: CinematicNodeContext: steps closer to the barsNodeContext: in shock

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_2.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_2.text: You taught me how. And then you destroyed me.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_30.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Prisoner launches himself forward, smashing against the bars, reaching for Astarion, who steps back just in time. The prisoner collapses sobbing.NodeContext: Shout of rage

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_87.speaker: Narrator
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_87.text: *Beneath the dirt and blood, you notice that every prisoner has a rune carved into their flesh.*
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_87.context: CinematicNodeContext: Close up of main prisoner's face, and the rune-scar on his cheek

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_28.speaker: Player
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_28.text: Look at the symbols - they all have scars.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_22.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_22.text: So Cazador marked them too - bound us all to his ritual.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_110.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_110.text: Gods, I know so many of these faces.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_83.speaker: Player
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_83.text: His scar matches one of the runes on your back.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_68.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_68.text: Then they're bound to the Black Mass too. Bound through the scars. And through me.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_56.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_56.text: I know these faces - every one that shares my scar.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_36.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_36.text: It's not just him - I know so many of these faces.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_8.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_8.text: They're my conquests. I pursued them, seduced them, then brought them to Cazador. He told us he was feeding on them.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_67.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_67.text: But he turned them to spawn. He turned every last one so he'd have souls for this cursed ritual.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_14.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_14.text: How long have I been down here?
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Getting from his knees to his feetNodeContext: rising anger

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_100.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_100.text: One hundred and seventy years. You were one of my first.
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_100.context: NodeContext: muted, with a touch of shame

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_71.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_71.text: My family - my friends - they're gone...
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_71.context: NodeContext: cracked voice, his mind is slipping

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_26.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_26.text: You took them from me. You took everything from me!

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_11.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_11.text: Free? We'll never be free while that monster lives.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_90.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_90.text: That's why we're here - to destroy Cazador.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_81.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_81.text: And then? What happens to us?

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_61.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_61.text: But even if you can kill him - what then? What happens to us?

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_103.speaker: Player
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_103.text: Like I said - we'll set you free.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_40.speaker: Player
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_40.text: We'll set you free - what else?

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_15.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_15.text: Free from this nightmare? It doesn't feel possible...

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_102.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_102.text: I promise you, I know that feeling all too well. But it can be done.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_43.speaker: Player
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_43.text: That depends on you. Can you control your hunger?

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_97.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_97.text: I - I don't know. It's all I've ever felt...

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_77.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_77.text: Trust me when I say I know the feeling. But you can resist the urge.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_75.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_75.text: Whatever you do, just do it quickly. I can't go on waiting...

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_79.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_79.text: We'll be back. You have my word.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_20.speaker: Player
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_20.text: What do you want to happen?

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_85.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_85.text: I don't know. I just don't want to die down here. Please...

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_76.speaker: Player
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_76.text: On second thought, freeing a bunch of ravenous spawn seems like a bad idea.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_51.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_51.text: No - no, you can't leave us here. Not now - not like this!

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_17.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_17.text: This nightmare never ends and it's your fault. You did this, damn you!
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pointing at AstarionNodeContext: Accusing Astarion, a mix of rage of despair

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_72.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_72.text: I damn you to the Hells! I damn you to misery! I damn you - damn you...
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Breaking down, crying, falling to his kneesNodeContext: Mix of rage and sobbing tears - Sebastian is broken

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_98.speaker: Player
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_98.text: I have no intention of freeing a bunch of ravenous spawn.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_80.speaker: Player
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_80.text: Where's the key to your cell?

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_84.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_84.text: But he never sets it down - you'll never get it.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_35.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_35.text: You can't stop him. No one can stop him.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_104.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_104.text: Free? I'll never be free. I can't even die!

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_12.speaker: Player
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_12.text: Stop whining - the only thing that matters is killing Cazador. He's responsible for all of this.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_111.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_111.text: I don't blame that monster. I blame him.
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_111.context: CinematicNodeContext: pointing at Astarion and snarling in anger

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_105.speaker: Player
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_105.text: Cazador plans to use you in his ritual - that's why he scarred you. Let us help.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_88.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_88.text: Help? Help? There's no helping us while that monster lives.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_42.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_42.text: Help? From the one who cursed us to this?!

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_4.speaker: Sebastian
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_4.text: There's no escape. No escape for us and no escape for you, Astarion!

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_41.speaker: Player
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_41.text: Is this how all of your lovers end up?

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_73.speaker: Player
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_73.text: Whatever this is, we don't have time for it.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_29.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_29.text: You don't understand - it's not just him.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_44.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_44.text: I know so many of these faces.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_32.speaker: Player
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_32.text: Is this how you used to live, Astarion?

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_53.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_53.text: Hardly. Cazador didn't keep me in luxury, but I've never seen anything like this.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_47.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_47.text: I have no idea what these wretches are doing here. 'The Master' had a more refined palate than this.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_10.speaker: Player
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_10.text: Astarion - do you know who these prisoners are?

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_60.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_60.text: I don't even know what this prison is. He hid all of this from me and the others.

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_18.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_18.text: If I had to guess, I'd say they're part of his ritual. But where in the hells did they come from?

Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_96.speaker: Astarion
Cells_OM_Astarion_COM_96.text: I'm just surprised to see such wretched-looking specimens - Cazador had a more refined palate than this.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: And? What more could you possibly have to say?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Leave.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *Here lies Astarion's tormentor. The one who's haunted his nightmares all this time.*

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion pulls Cazador from the coffin, throwing him to the ground. Cazador lands on his knees.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Get your hands off me, worm.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cazador is slumped on the ground, waking up from his restNodeContext: Weakly, but with a stress on 'worm'

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I'm not the one in the dirt.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: with contempt
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion bends over and picks up the dagger that's fallen from Cazador's belt

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: One last thrust and I'll be free of you. I'll never have to fear you again.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: playing with the knife in his handNodeContext: Thinking, playing with the knife in his hand

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: But if I finish the ritual you started, I'll never have to fear anyone, ever.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You think me a fool? That I would allow anyone to usurp me, speak the words, and ascend in my place?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: The runes I carved into your flesh bind you and all seven thousand souls to the ritual. Complete it and those bearing the scars will be sacrificed - you included.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You are simply a means to an end. I made you to be consumed.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I am so much more than what you made me.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I need your eyes. In a manner of speaking.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Use the parasite - link your mind to mine. Through your eyes, I can see the scars on my back and copy them onto his.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You would not dare.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I would. And I will. You will be consumed and all the power you've lusted after will be mine.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Lae'zel
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Astarion - I've known this craving too. Craving for power, for control. But I fear your lust verges on madness.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Shadowheart
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I sacrificed others so that I could become who I needed to be - I won't deny you the same chance.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Shadowheart
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: At the cost of a lot of lives. It's not worth it, Astarion.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Wyll
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: And sacrifice all these people? Please - no power is worth their anguish, Astarion.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Gale
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: That power isn't worth so many lives - trust me.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Karlach
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: What are you doing?! All those people, Astarion - stop!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *Your minds join and your two selves become one. You can feel the knife in your hand, see the scars on his back, and taste his hunger for power.*
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: We see a merging of your mind and Astarion's, letting him see the scars on his back

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Yes. Yes, I see it!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: What are you doing? Don't - hrgh!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion steps behind Cazador, hunkers down, and starts to carve.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Argh... ARGH!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cazador screams as Astarion carves symbols into his backNodeContext: Cazador tries to resist screaming, but quickly gives in as Astarion carves symbols into his back

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: There. Perfect.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drops the knife to the floorNodeContext: Satisfied

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Ungrateful child. Wretched child...
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Weakly - you've just had your back cut to ribbons

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Time to take your place.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion picks up Cazador's staff and uses it to telekenetically yeet Cazador to the remaining rune The remaining rune lights up as Cazador floats into the sky, wrapped in spectral chains.
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion walks over to Cazador's old spot to begin the ritual

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Ecce dominus!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Throws his arms wide as he starts the ritualNodeContext: Latin [ECK-ay DOM-in-oos]

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Has animas offero in sacrificio...
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Latin (has A-nee-mas off-E-ro in sa-kri-FEE-chee-o)
CinematicNodeContext: Sound starts to build, the prisoners in the cells begin go scream

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Nunc volo potestatem quam pollicitus es mihi...
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Latin (nunc VO-lo po-tes-TA-tem kwam po-LI-ki-toos es MEE-hee)
CinematicNodeContext: Screams reach a peak and the spawn start to explode one by one

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: ARGH!!!!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Literally Explodes

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I... I can't feel it. That ache in my stomach, that hunger - it's gone.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I'm free. I'm finally free! Oh it feels delicious.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Come on, let's get out of here. I have a brand new world to explore.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Fine.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Said with seething anger

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: No - urgh!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion, hunkered down before him, stabs Cazador in the chest. Cazador slumps to the ground, lying on his back.
Astarion rams the knife into Cazador's chest over and over, letting out centuries of rage.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: [Panting]
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion is kneeling by the body, covered in gore, panting. The knife falls from his hand.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Is... is it over?
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion still kneeling. The voice of one of Cazador's other spawn comes from behind him.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Is he...?
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Timidly walking over to look at Cazador's body

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Yes, it's over. You can do whatever you want.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Moves from being on his knees to standing (same animation as N284, I hope) - addressing Spawn

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: As for those wretches in the cells - if I don't get my freedom, neither do they.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Without a word, Astarion breaks the staff (snapping it over his knee, or some other way of breaking it).

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: It's over. I'm done with this and I'm done with you.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Addressed to the players - they took Astarion's chance to ascend. He's done with them.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I would say good luck out there, but honestly? I hope you die screaming.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Addressed to the players - they took Astarion's chance to ascend. He's done with them.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Halsin
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: To sacrifice so many would be an abomination.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Jaheira
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: And what then, Astarion? You would use this power born of so much death for good, I suppose?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Minsc
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: We have no love for beasts. But to slaughter so many like chickens in coops, without even a fair hunt... it does not sit well with Boo.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Take the power you are owed, Astarion. Whatever the cost.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: urging Astarion to sacrifice thousands - excited, cruel

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: And then? What will you be without me? A shade? A spectre in the shadows, devoid of all purpose?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You might have made me what I am, but I can be so much more than what you created me to be.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: But I am grateful for one thing. You showed me how to really savour moments like this.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hunkers down face-to-face with CazadorNodeContext: Astarion is about to finally kill Cazador

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: No - urgh!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion, hunkered down before him, stabs Cazador in the chest. Cazador slumps to the ground, lying on his back.
Astarion rams the knife into Cazador's chest over and over, letting out centuries of rage.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: [Panting]
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion is kneeling by the body, covered in gore, panting. The knife falls from his hand.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Is... is it over?
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion still kneeling. The voice of one of Cazador's other spawn comes from behind him.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Is he...?
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Timidly walking over to look at Cazador's body

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Yes. He's gone.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion gets up off his knees

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Pale Petras
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: What does that mean for us?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: It means you have a choice.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You can hide here, living in the shadows like parasites, or you can be more than what he made us to be.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: And what does it mean for them?
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gesturing to the prisoners in the cages all around them (this is in a vast cavern full of cells and cages

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: The poor wretches in the cells are innocent. They shouldn't have to suffer just because I lured them here.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion picks up Cazador's Staff
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion holds the staff and focuses.
CinematicNodeContext: We see prison doors swinging open and vampire spawn taking their first tentative steps out of their cells.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: They'll need someone to lead them. Take the tunnels into the Underdark, find somewhere... well, not safe, but less perilous?
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: To the other spawnNodeContext: To the other spawn

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Pale Petras
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: What? No, we can't -

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Just try to keep them out of trouble.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cutting off his brotherNodeContext: Cutting off his brother
CinematicNodeContext: The spawn opens their mouth to speak, but thinks better of it. They nod.
CinematicNodeContext: The vampire spawn turn and walk away.
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion stands up

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: It's over. It's finally over.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Astarion just freed all Cazador's prisoners, your last act before leaving the dungeon. Relieved, but weary.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: No, no. No healing sleep for you. Wake up!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion is in front of Cazador's coffin, which is open, showing the vampire recovering inside
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion pulls Cazador from the coffin, throwing him to the ground. Cazador lands on his knees.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Get your hands off me, worm.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cazador is slumped on the ground, waking up from his restNodeContext: Weakly, but with a stress on 'worm'

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I'm not the one in the dirt.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: with contempt
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion bends over and picks up the dagger that's fallen from Cazador's belt

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: One last thrust and I'll be free of you. I'll never have to fear you again.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: playing with the knife in his handNodeContext: Thinking, playing with the knife in his hand

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: But if I finish the ritual you started, I'll never have to fear anyone, ever.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You think me a fool? That I would allow anyone to usurp me, speak the words, and ascend in my place?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
