RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: The runes I carved into your flesh bind you and all seven thousand souls to the ritual. Complete it and those bearing the scars will be sacrificed - you included.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You are simply a means to an end. I made you to be consumed.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I am so much more than what you made me.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *You see your beloved, standing on the precipice. On one side is untold power, at the cost of seven thousand souls. On the other - vulnerability and weakness. But perhaps redemption too.*

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *You see Astarion, standing on the precipice. On one side is untold power, at the cost of seven thousand souls. On the other - vulnerability. But perhaps redemption too.*

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: What are you waiting for? Help me!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I can do this, but I need your help.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: To AvatarNodeContext: To Avatar

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: If I help you complete the ritual, it will kill all these people.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: These people died years ago, trust me on that. All that's left are feral spawn, desperate for blood.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: If we release them, how many people will they kill? Tens of thousands? Hundreds of thousands?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: But if they die and I ascend, I won't have to rely on the parasite to walk in the sun. I'll be free - truly, completely free. Isn't that what you want?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I want you to live a life you're proud of. You can't be proud of this.
True

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You - you're right. I can be better than him.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: But I'm not above enjoying this.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hunkers down face-to-face with Cazador

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: No - urgh!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion, hunkered down before him, stabs Cazador in the chest. Cazador slumps to the ground, lying on his back.
Astarion rams the knife into Cazador's chest over and over, letting out centuries of rage.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: [Panting]
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion is kneeling by the body, covered in gore, panting. The knife falls from his hand.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Is... is it over?
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion still kneeling. The voice of one of Cazador's other spawn comes from behind him.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Is he...?
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Timidly walking over to look at Cazador's body

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Yes. He's gone.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion gets up off his knees

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Pale Petras
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: What does that mean for us?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: It means you're free - you can do whatever you want.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: 'You can do whatever you want' sounds terrifying - and it is - but there's opportunity in it, too.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You can hide here, living in the shadows like parasites, or you can be more than what he made us to be.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You can choose differently, of course, but the consequences are on your head.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: And what does it mean for them?
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gesturing to the prisoners in the cages all around them (this is in a vast cavern full of cells and cages

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Now that's a better question. Seven thousand spawn, from ancient conquests to stolen children...

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *Cazador's staff controlled everything during the ritual. If it controls the cells too, you could decide their fate.*

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: They're too dangerous - they need to die.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Pale Petras
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: And when they're dead? Will you kill us too?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: We're not like those wretches, brother. We've spent lifetimes controlling our hunger - they're all but feral.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I don't relish it any more than you do, but putting them to rest may be the kindest thing we can do.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion picks up Cazador's Staff
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion holds the staff and focuses.

CinematicNodeContext: As the last spawns die, the prisoners in the cells also scream and explode

JLatino: "sending a rain of blood down on us" cut to simply VFX

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Lae'zel
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Snuffed out in an instant, but to whose satisfaction? They will never feed and never be hunted. And never have a chance to hew their own paths.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Shadowheart
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Wise choice. Now the streets will be safer and you'll be stronger.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Approving

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Shadowheart
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: All those lives, just snuffed out... I hope it was worth it.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Dismayed

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Wyll
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Hells. They deserved better. They deserved a chance.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Gale
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: All gone, just like that... I hope it was worth it.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Dismayed and bitter at the sacrifice of a large amount of people.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Karlach
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: It's done. Just like that. Gods, help us.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Halsin
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: All those lives snuffed out, just to grasp some power. That was craven - unnatural.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Jaheira
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: A cold kind of mercy. But mercy still, I think, Astarion.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Grim, she watched Astarion kill dozens of vampire spawn rather than leave them to die / go feral. A note of comfort at the end.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Astarion...
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Shocked. Astarion just killed 7000 people with a spell

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Follow the tunnels to the Underdark. You'll be... well, not 'safe' there, but in less peril.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Turning to the spawnNodeContext: Matter of fact

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Minsc
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: To end so many with only rhyming and words... the sword would have been messy, yes. But cleaner too, thinks Boo.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: A little shaken by the ritual 'mercy-killing' of thousands of vampire spawn he just witnessed. They were beasts, yes, but even beasts deserve a death in battle.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: No different than burning out an infestation of vermin. It was well done.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: cruel satisfaction

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I don't like it, but you're right. Putting them to rest may be the kindest thing we can do.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Let's release them. They deserve the same chance you got.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Lae'zel
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: A herd of vampire spawn, unleashed on the Sword Coast. What could go wrong?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Shadowheart
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I can't say I'd have done the same, but your choice in the end.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Shadowheart
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You did the right thing. Some sacrifices just aren't worth it.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Wyll
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: They're victims, Astarion - just like you. They deserve freedom, too.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Gale
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You chose well. They may not be the safest types to unleash, but their deaths would have weighed heavy on you.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Karlach
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Seven thousand Astarions, unleashed on the Sword Coast. It'll be a well-dressed flood of mayhem, at least.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Halsin
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Good - they deserve a chance at life. Nature will handle their fates from here.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Jaheira
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: And what of the living they'll feast on, should they not prove as admirable as Astarion? They deserve a chance, too.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Quwstioning our notion to release vampire spawns - she understands the gesture and even goes so far as to compliment Astarion, but is pessimistic.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: The poor wretches in the cells are innocent. They shouldn't have to suffer just because I lured them here.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: We see prison doors swinging open and vampire spawn taking their first tentative steps out of their cells.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: They'll need someone to lead them. Take the tunnels into the Underdark, find somewhere... well, not safe, but less perilous?
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: To the other spawnNodeContext: To the other spawn

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Pale Petras
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: What? No, we can't -

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Just try to keep them out of trouble.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cutting off his brotherNodeContext: Cutting off his brother
CinematicNodeContext: The spawn opens their mouth to speak, but thinks better of it. They nod.
CinematicNodeContext: The vampire spawn turn and walk away.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I... I think we're done here.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Let's go.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Quietly

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Minsc
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Boo thinks you are being hasty, friend. He enjoys the hunt as much as any hamster, but... that is a lot of Astarions.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Reacting to the prospect of letting thousands of vampire spawns go free. It's a given that they'll be hunted down if they stray from the path of rightenousness

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: If you release those ravenous starvelings, the city's poorer quarters will be their feasthall.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You're right.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Why not just leave them? They're not our responsibility.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You can't be serious. After everything, you'd just leave them here?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Without a word, Astarion breaks the staff (snapping it over his knee, or some other way of breaking it).

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: No! Why?!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I am done picking up after Cazador. I wash my hands of all of this. This place, this ritual, these people.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You can stay if you want, but I have a life and I intend to live it.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Come on. Let's go.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Ah. Now that is a question...

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: What do you want it to mean?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Pale Petras
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I... I don't know.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Your choices are simple, really.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: That depends - can you keep your fangs to yourself?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Pale Petras
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: What business is it of yours?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: It will become everyone's business if you try to feast on half the city. This is just a friendly warning.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Say nothing.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: It means you have a choice.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *His old master lies dead, never to control Astarion again. He's free - unlike the thousands of spawn still trapped in their cells.*

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *Seven thousand vampire spawn, including the stolen children of the Gur hunters. What will you do with them all?*
False

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: And I want to live a full life! Not some half existence, hiding in the shadows for the rest of eternity.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Look into his eyes - try to see what's driving this.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Look into your lover's eyes - try to see what's driving this.
True

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *You can see the fear in his eyes, but also the hunger. The thick smell of blood in the air and the promise of power being so close is intoxicating to him.*

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *All he can see is the power of the ritual, and the freedom that power brings. The freedom to do anything - to be anything.*
False

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *All you can see are those eyes you've seen so many times before, pleading with you to help him.*

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I know you think this will set you free, but it won't. This power will trap you, just like it trapped Cazador.
True
False

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I'm not him, and I will not become him.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Please! I can't do this alone.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: No, I won't do it.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Fine.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Said with seething anger

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Yes, it's over. You can do whatever you want.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Moves from being on his knees to standing (same animation as N284, I hope) - addressing Spawn

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: As for those wretches in the cells - if I don't get my freedom, neither do they.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: It's over. I'm done with this and I'm done with you.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Addressed to the players - they took Astarion's chance to ascend. He's done with them.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I would say good luck out there, but honestly? I hope you die screaming.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Addressed to the players - they took Astarion's chance to ascend. He's done with them.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: All right, what do you need?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I need your eyes. In a manner of speaking.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: What do you think you are doing?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Unmaking what you made me.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Use the parasite - link your mind to mine. Through your eyes, I can see the scars on my back and copy them onto his.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You would not dare.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I would. And I will. You will be consumed and all the power you've lusted after will be mine.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Lae'zel
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Astarion - I've known this craving too. Craving for power, for control. But I fear your lust verges on madness.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Shadowheart
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I sacrificed others so that I could become who I needed to be - I won't deny you the same chance.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Help me do this. Please.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Enter Astarion's mind so he can proceed with the ritual.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *Your minds join and your two selves become one. You can feel the knife in your hand, see the scars on his back, and taste his hunger for power.*
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: We see a merging of your mind and Astarion's, letting him see the scars on his back

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Yes. Yes, I see it!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: What are you doing? Don't - hrgh!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion steps behind Cazador, hunkers down, and starts to carve.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Argh... ARGH!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cazador screams as Astarion carves symbols into his backNodeContext: Cazador tries to resist screaming, but quickly gives in as Astarion carves symbols into his back

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: There. Perfect.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drops the knife to the floorNodeContext: Satisfied

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Ungrateful child. Wretched child...
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Weakly - you've just had your back cut to ribbons

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Time to take your place.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion picks up Cazador's staff and uses it to telekenetically yeet Cazador to the remaining rune The remaining rune lights up as Cazador floats into the sky, wrapped in spectral chains.
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion walks over to Cazador's old spot to begin the ritual

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Ecce dominus!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Throws his arms wide as he starts the ritualNodeContext: Latin [ECK-ay DOM-in-oos]

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Has animas offero in sacrificio...
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Latin (has A-nee-mas off-E-ro in sa-kri-FEE-chee-o)
CinematicNodeContext: Sound starts to build, the prisoners in the cells begin go scream

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Lae'zel
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: No. This isn't the way!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Shadowheart
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Some destinies require sacrifice. Do as you must.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: call out, evil and encouraging

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Shadowheart
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: No, Astarion! Stop this!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Alarmed

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Wyll
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: No! What are you doing?!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Gale
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: No, Astarion, do not speak those words! The cost is too great!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Karlach
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: What are you doing?! All those people, Astarion - stop!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: a bit panic

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Halsin
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: All these lives at stake... we cannot allow this to happen.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I can feel it! I CAN FEEL THEIR POWER FLOWING INTO ME!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Let the ritual continue.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Let the ritual continue.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Nunc volo potestatem quam pollicitus es mihi...
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Latin (nunc VO-lo po-tes-TA-tem kwam po-LI-ki-toos es MEE-hee)
CinematicNodeContext: Screams reach a peak and the spawn start to explode one by one

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: ARGH!!!!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Literally Explodes

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I... I can't feel it. That ache in my stomach, that hunger - it's gone.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I'm free. I'm finally free! Oh it feels delicious.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You did it! I can't believe you did it!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I did. We did.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: So... what now?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Now we deal with the elder brain. I no longer require its parasite, so we can end this once and for all.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: And? What can a Vampire Ascendant do?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I think the answer to that is 'whatever they damn well please'.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Not sure I like the sound of that.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Oh don't worry, darling. I won't bite unless you ask very, very nicely.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Come on, let's get out of here. I have a brand new world to explore.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Stop Astarion.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: What are you doing? No - stop!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Player is intervening to stop the ritual
CinematicNodeContext: Player grabs the knife from the floor where Astarion dropped it and throws it at Cazador.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Ugh - heh.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: The knife hits Cazador in the chest, who dies with a vindictive smile. All effects of the ritual collapse around AstarionNodeContext: Stabbed in the chest, you die with a vindictive chuckle knowing Astarion has failed

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: It's - it's gone. All that power.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: in shock

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I'm sorry, but I couldn't let you do it.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You couldn't let me? You couldn't let me?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You don't need it. You're more than strong enough as you are.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Don't you tell me what I needed!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You were mad with power. What else could I do?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: All you had to do was stand there! But no, even that was too much much to ask.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I was so close. I could have had it all, but you took everything from me.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Cazador won after all. I'll never escape the hell he built.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: And if I can't escape, then no one can. Not them...

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Without a word, Astarion breaks the staff (snapping it over his knee, or some other way of breaking it).

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: And certainly not you.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Astarion will attack the player after this line.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Stop Astarion.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Don't you dare! I CAN FEEL THEIR POWER FLOWING INTO ME!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *The screams of the prisoners ring in your ears. Their time is almost up.*

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Jaheira
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Are we truly to be party to this?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Minsc
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Enough! We can still stop the nonsense words in his mouth!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Urgent - Astarion is mid creepy Latin ritual, and Minsc is uneasy

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Yes, Astarion. Take the power you are owed, whatever the cost.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: No, we can't. I won't help you.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Shadowheart
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: At the cost of a lot of lives. It's not worth it, Astarion.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Wyll
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: And sacrifice all these people? Please - no power is worth their anguish, Astarion.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Gale
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: That power isn't worth so many lives - trust me.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Karlach
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: What are you doing?! All those people, Astarion - stop!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Halsin
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: To sacrifice so many would be an abomination.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Jaheira
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: And what then, Astarion? You would use this power born of so much death for good, I suppose?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Minsc
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: We have no love for beasts. But to slaughter so many like chickens in coops, without even a fair hunt... it does not sit well with Boo.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Take the power you are owed, Astarion. Whatever the cost.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: urging Astarion to sacrifice thousands - excited, cruel

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I can't. I'm sorry.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: But if I complete the ritual, think of the power I'll have. With me by your side, we can save the city - we can save ourselves!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Didn't you hear him? If you complete the ritual, you'll be consumed.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Trust me, I know what I'm doing.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I'm not doing this.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Get over here. We can do this.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: To AvatarNodeContext: To Avatar

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You can't finish the ritual - you'll kill all these people!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Didn't you hear him? If you complete the ritual, you'll be consumed.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: And then? What will you be without me? A shade? A spectre in the shadows, devoid of all purpose?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: He'll be free. Nothing else matters.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: The spawn will never be free. He is my creation, now and for eternity.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You might have made me what I am, but I can be so much more than what you created me to be.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: But I am grateful for one thing. You showed me how to really savour moments like this.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hunkers down face-to-face with CazadorNodeContext: Astarion is about to finally kill Cazador

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: He'll be a hero.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Hero? You think they will sing songs of the blood-drinking saviour? The one who lurks in the shadows?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Maybe they will. Maybe they won't. Maybe it doesn't matter.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: He'll be mine. And I'll be his.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Cling to that if you must, but know it is a lie. He's mine.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: He's not wrong. There's always going to be a part of him in me.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Player
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Hells, just kill him already!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Fine.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: With a sigh, mildly irritated

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Yes, my boy?
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: A little softer, Astarion showed him mercy

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *There he lies. Your tormentor. The one who's haunted your nightmares for centuries.*

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *If you let him regenerate, he's sure to come after you again.*

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Pull him from the coffin.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion pulls Cazador from the coffin, throwing him to the ground. Cazador lands on his knees.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Get your hands off me, worm.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cazador is slumped on the ground, waking up from his restNodeContext: Weakly, but with a stress on 'worm'
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion bends over and picks up the dagger that's fallen from Cazador's belt

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Put it away, boy. You do not know what you are doing.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Tell me how to complete the ritual.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Stab him without a word.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I'm waiting to hear you beg for your life.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Ha! I would embrace oblivion before I give you that satisfaction.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Doesn't believe Astarion would really kill him

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Oblivion can be arranged.
True

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You... you would never. I have given you so much.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: starting to doubt

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I snatched you from the jaws of death and gave you eternity, for hells' sake. I saved you!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: trying to persuade

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Do it. Beg.
True

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I... Please.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: My child, please... have mercy.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: All right. You can live.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: My boy, I knew you would make the right decision. I raised you well.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Tell me how to complete the ritual and I might spare you.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Stab him.
False

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: The day I fear one of my own whelps is the day I deserve the void.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Do it, if you have the mettle. Strike.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Daring Astarion to kill him

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You saved me to create a pawn you could use! I should kill you for that alone.
True

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I - no. No, you misunderstand, boy. I did that for you. Because I could not see you suffer.
False

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: More words, more prattle. You always adored the sound of your own voice. It's why the others hated you so.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: InternalNodeContext: 'the others' = the other vampire spawnNodeContext: Tired of Astarion talking

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Tell me how to complete the ritual and I might spare you.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Stab him without another word.
False

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Never!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Then tell me how to complete the ritual.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You think me a fool? That I would allow anyone to usurp me, speak the words, and ascend in my place?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: The runes I carved into your flesh bind you and all seven thousand souls to the ritual. Complete it and those bearing the scars will be sacrificed - you included.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *You can see from the glee in his face that he's telling the truth and he thinks you have no way forward. But then again, he didn't say whom the scars had to be carved into...*

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Then you can bear my runes and be sacrificed in my place.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: No. You do not have the skill.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Your knife will slip. You will misremember a rune. A single mistake and you will be consumed.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Lae'zel
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I can see your scars. The torment you felt... your mind and body at the mercy of another master...

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Shadowheart
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I can see your scars... all of them. I know what it's like to suffer like that, only I bear fewer reminders on my skin.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Quiet shock/empathy

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Wyll
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Hells. I see your scars - in full view.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Gale
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Those scars... great pain's been visited upon you. I'm sorry.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Empathetic

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Karlach
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I can see the scars. No one should have to suffer like you suffered. No one.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: With determination and a little verklempt

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Halsin
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Your scars... I see them all. They tell a painful story.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Jaheira
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: My eyes are sharp enough to see you squirm, vampire lord. They can guide Astarion, too.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Minsc
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Boo's eyes are sharper than your teeth, grave-lord. He will guide Astarion's blade.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Looking down on Cazador in contempt - and triumph at being able to help Astarion end him

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Your scars are exquisite, Astarion. A dangerous weapon, and a work of art.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: no sarcasm or any derogatory intention - she genuinely finds the scars aesthetically pleasing

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Enter your companion's mind and see the scars through their eyes.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *Your minds join and your two selves become one. You can feel the knife in your hand, but also see the scars on your back.*

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *If you complete this ritual, there will be no atonement. Seven thousand of your own kind, dead by your hand. All but Cazador yourself.*

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Carve the symbols into his back.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: What are you doing? Don't - hrgh!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion steps behind Cazador, hunkers down, and starts to carve.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Argh... ARGH!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cazador screams as Astarion carves symbols into his backNodeContext: Cazador tries to resist screaming, but quickly gives in as Astarion carves symbols into his back

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *The link between your minds fades and you're left looking at the fresh runes. Let's hope you copied them accurately...*

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Ungrateful child. Wretched child...
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Weakly - you've just had your back cut to ribbons

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Lae'zel
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Tsk'va. You would sacrifice thousands of souls for your own power? Your hunger veers towards madness, Astarion.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Shadowheart
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Do it. Claim what's yours - and give him what he deserves.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Resolved, encouraging. The 'him' refers to Cazador, Astarion's former master

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Shadowheart
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Don't do it, Astarion. Thousands will die unless you stay your hand.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Urging peace

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Wyll
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Astarion - please. No power is worth these prisoners' torment.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Gale
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Leave it, Astarion. The butcher's bill is too steep, no matter what power it grants you.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Karlach
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Astarion, no. This isn't you. It can't be. You can't sacrifice thousands for yourself. It just doesn't add up.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Halsin
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Stay your hand, Astarion. To sacrifice so many is a tyrant's ambition.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Jaheira
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Enough now, Astarion. There is only one life that needs taking here, and you have it in your grasp.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: note of caution = punishing cazador is all well and good, but completing his ritual is not.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Minsc
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Now you have had your fun. End the vampire, says Boo - and this foul magicking with him.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Trying to rein Astarion in - torturing Cazador, a-ok. Using him in a dark ritual, no. 'foul magicking' = 'dark ritual'

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Claim your due, Astarion, no matter the cost. Kill them all.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Begin the ritual.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: No, do not do this. Please!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion picks up Cazador's staff and uses it to telekenetically yeet Cazador to the remaining rune The remaining rune lights up as Cazador floats into the sky, wrapped in spectral chains.
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion walks over to Cazador's old spot to begin the ritual

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Ecce dominus!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Throws his arms wide as he starts the ritualNodeContext: Latin [ECK-ay DOM-in-oos]

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Has animas offero in sacrificio...
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Latin (has A-nee-mas off-E-ro in sa-kri-FEE-chee-o)
CinematicNodeContext: Sound starts to build, the prisoners in the cells begin go scream

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *You can feel the prisoners' power start to flow through you - racing through your veins, even as their screams ring in your ears.*

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: No! Brother, please!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Chained as part of the ritual

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Nunc volo potestatem quam pollicitus es mihi...
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Latin (nunc VO-lo po-tes-TA-tem kwam po-LI-ki-toos es MEE-hee)
CinematicNodeContext: Screams reach a peak and the spawn start to explode one by one

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: ARGH!!!!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Literally Explodes

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *For the first time since you can remember, the gnawing pain in your stomach is gone. You can feel new strength in your body and new power at your fingertips.*

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Lae'zel
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Snuffed out in an instant. They will never feed and never be hunted. And never have a chance to hew their own paths. Was it worth it, Astarion?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Shadowheart
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Well done. You did what was best for you - don't let anyone tell you otherwise.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Approving

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Shadowheart
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I hope that was worth it. Even the Absolute's armies couldn't hope to kill so many, so quickly.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Bitter/disappointed

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Wyll
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Hells. They deserved better. They deserved a chance. Tell me, Astarion. Was the power worth their sacrifice?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Gale
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: All those lives... was it truly worth it?
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Dismayed/bitter at the number of people sacrificed to empower Astarion

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Karlach
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You did it. You really did it. There's no coming back from this, Astarion. Was it worth it?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Halsin
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Your power is buoyed by a sea of innocent blood. I hope you are pleased.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Jaheira
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Well, Lord Vampire? Was it everything you hoped?
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Absolute disgust for what Astarion has just done (used the life force of vampire thralls like him to elevate himself to a lord)

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: This feels incredible. I'm a new person.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Bow before the greatest vampire the Sword Coast has ever seen!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: It doesn't feel much different, honestly.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *You stand, relishing the silence. You can hear nothing but the drip of blood and the pounding of your newly reborn heart.*

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Minsc
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: To die by the sword is just. But to end so many with only rhyming and words... Boo wonders if this is truly what you wanted?
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: A little shaken out of his bravado. He's just watched Astarion kill a legion of vampire spawn in a dark ritual - good riddance to vampire spawn, but he's a little shaken nonetheless

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Glorious. You have claimed the power of immortals, Lord Astarion. How does it feel?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Kill Cazador and abandon the ritual.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Is... is it over?
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion still kneeling. The voice of one of Cazador's other spawn comes from behind him.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Is he...?
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Timidly walking over to look at Cazador's body

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Yes. He's gone.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion gets up off his knees

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Pale Petras
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: What does that mean for us?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: It means you're free - you can do whatever you want.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Whatever we want? We can... feed?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: What do you want it to mean?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Pale Petras
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I want to feed.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Pale Petras
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: After all these years, I want to taste the blood of a thinking creature.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Don't. People ask questions when bodies start appearing.
True

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Pale Petras
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Yes yes, all right.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: With a sigh.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: And the ones we brought here? What are you going to do with seven thousand spawn?
False

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You can try, but I will stop you. Just like I stopped Cazador.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Do what you like, it's none of my concern.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Then do! Slake your thirst.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Pale Petras
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Tonight will be glorious.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *Cazador's staff controlled everything during the ritual. If it controls the cells too, you could decide their fate.*

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *Seven thousand vampire spawn, including the stolen children of the Gur hunters. What will you do with them all?*

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Use the staff to destroy the prisoners.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion picks up Cazador's Staff
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion holds the staff and focuses.

CinematicNodeContext: As the last spawns die, the prisoners in the cells also scream and explode

JLatino: "sending a rain of blood down on us" cut to simply VFX

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Astarion...
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Shocked. Astarion just killed 7000 people with a spell
CinematicNodeContext: The spawn opens their mouth to speak, but thinks better of it. They nod.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Use the staff to set the prisoners free.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: We see prison doors swinging open and vampire spawn taking their first tentative steps out of their cells.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Lae'zel
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: A herd of vampire spawn, unleashed on the Sword Coast. What could go wrong?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Shadowheart
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I didn't realise you had such a soft streak, Astarion. Now it'll cost you. And the city as well, perhaps...
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Disapproving (but not deeply angry - just thinks it was a bad call)

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Shadowheart
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You did the right thing. All those deaths would have weighed you down.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Relieved/approving

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Wyll
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: They're victims, Astarion - just like you. They deserve freedom, too.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Gale
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: For the best. They may not be the safest types to unleash, but their deaths would have weighed heavy on you.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You did the right thing. Although they will need guidance.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Pale Petras
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: There's only one place seven thousand spawn can feed without drawing attention.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: We will lead them into the Underdark. They will not be safe, but at least they will have a chance.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Thank you, brother.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Karlach
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Seven thousand Astarions, unleashed on the Sword Coast. It'll be a well-dressed flood of mayhem, at least.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Halsin
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: A wise choice. Let nature determine their fates.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Jaheira
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Perhaps I should applaud the liberation of bound creatures. But somehow I sense I will be the one cleaning up this mess.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Minsc
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Fly, Astarions! Return to this city, and you will answer to BOO!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: All creepy vampire spawn are 'Astarions'. Minsc is only now realising the gravity of letting them all free - so he leaves them with this parting threat

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You have unleashed a horde of monstrous starvelings. Have no doubt, the city's poorer quarters will be their feasthall.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Destroy the staff so they can never escape.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Without a word, Astarion breaks the staff (snapping it over his knee, or some other way of breaking it).

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: No! Why?!

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: After everything we've been through, you're going to let them rot here?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I thought you were better than that.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: The vampire spawn turn and walk away.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Lae'zel
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Come, Astarion. It's time to go.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Shadowheart
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I think we're finished here. Let's go.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Wyll
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Come on. There's nothing left for us here.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Gale
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: There is nothing more to be done here. High time we left.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Karlach
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Come on, Astarion. Let's get out of here. You've done all you can.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Halsin
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I sense there is little else to be said or done here.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Jaheira
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Come, let's be free of this foul place. There is little else to be done.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Minsc
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Enough of this place. Boo wishes to sun himself once more - and now you may join him.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: Bored now all the drama has faded. Inviting Astarion to lay in the sun with Boo - the highest of honours

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: The spawn will not feed in the Underdark - it will eat them alive. Good riddance.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: NodeContext: arrogant, speaking of vampire spawn who were freed and fled to the Underdark

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Come - we have exhausted the limited charms of this place.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: They're not my concern.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Farewell, brother.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: I simply do not care.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Then we'll make our own way.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: That depends. Can you swear to me you won't feed on mortals?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Pale Petras
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Tell me you're joking.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Pale Petras
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: After all these years you want us to go back to feeding on beasts?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: You don't have to eat rats. Feast on a lion or a dragon - just not people.
True

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Pale Petras
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: All right, you've made your point. You have our word.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Although, what of them? What are you going to do with the ones we brought here?
False

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Pale Petras
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: A beast is a beast, and I am not going to be freed of his chains just to put on yours.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Start killing people and I'll stop you. Just like I stopped Cazador.
True
False

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Pale Petras
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Cazador was alone - we are not. And we will not let you stand in the way of our freedom.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Wait, what of the others? What are you going to do with the ones we brought here?

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Do what you like, but you're dealing with the consequences.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Pale Petras
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: We shall. Gladly.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Narrator
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: *Your old master lies dead, never to control you again. You're free - unlike the thousands of spawn that are still trapped in his cells.*
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion gets up from his knees

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Kill Cazador and abandon the ritual.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Carve the symbols into his back.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Try to remember the runes on your back and carve them into Cazador's flesh.
True
False

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Enter your companion's mind and see the scars through their eyes.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Just kill him.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Give him his wish - kill him.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Cazador Szarr
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: No - urgh!
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion, hunkered down before him, stabs Cazador in the chest. Cazador slumps to the ground, lying on his back.
Astarion rams the knife into Cazador's chest over and over, letting out centuries of rage.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: [Panting]
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion is kneeling by the body, covered in gore, panting. The knife falls from his hand.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Is... is it over?
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion still kneeling. The voice of one of Cazador's other spawn comes from behind him.

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Dalyria
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Is he...?
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Timidly walking over to look at Cazador's body

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Yes. He's gone.
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion gets up off his knees

RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.speaker: Astarion
RitualRoom_PostCombat_OM_Astarion_AOM_CO.text: Walk away.
